model.board

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.board.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardExit, ItemPath, UndestructibleWall

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the interface of interest to clients and maintains an instance of a ItemState subclass that defines the current state.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
